data.author: Lemon xD

changelog.release_notes: v1.3: Fixed bug in date not showing correctly for 0-9, due to font limitations.
Added a settings page for GPS, location and units. If GPS is set to false, location is editable with location name. Units enables selection between Celsius and Fahrenheit.
Fixed temperature actually defaulting to 째F. Now back to 째C. :)

data.description:
This watchface is a tribute to "4Cells Original" that comes with Canvas for Pebble. I wanted to make a watchface that would load quickly on the watch, which was not the case with the Canvas watchface.
The 4 tabs of the original watchface were retained: Date with day of the week, Weather with location and icon, Battery status (only watch) and BT connection, and Time.

v1.3 - Fixed date not showing correctly for 1-9
v1.2 - Added settings page - GPS or user selected location and 째C/째F. Time is still only 24hrs format.

latest_release.release_notes: v1.3: Fixed bug in date not showing correctly for 0-9, due to font limitations.

data.title: 4Cells Tribute
